Ingredients.1: 1 (16 ounce) package Italian herb polenta tube, cut into 1/2 inch slices (12 slices)

Ingredients.3: 1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced ripe olives, drained

Directions.1: Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place polenta rounds on a cutting board and brush both sides with extra-virgin olive oil. Transfer 1/2 of the rounds to the air fryer basket.

Directions.3: Air-fry for 15 minutes. Using tongs, flip rounds over, and cook for 5 minutes more. Sprinkle 1/2 of the sliced olives over the polenta and top with 1/2 of the mozzarella cheese. Cook until cheese has melted, about 2 more minutes.

Directions.4: Repeat with remaining half of polenta rounds, olives, and mozzarella cheese.
